taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Agent Handler Execute
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Use to call a handler that is loaded into a Kinetic Agent.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Handler Space
parameter.tooltip: The name of the space that the handler is defined in

parameter.label: Handler Slug
parameter.tooltip: The name of the handler slug to execute. ex foo_bar

parameter.label: Payload
parameter.tooltip: The payload to send to the Agent's handler. This should match the parameters of the handler adapter and be in JSON format. Ex: {"handler_param_name_1":"handler_param_value_1", "handler_param_name_2":"handler_param_value_2"}
